layer.name: Responsibility
layer.definition: If it's in your life, it's yours to address.

answers.4: mine, though circumstances make some harder
answers.2: shaped heavily by my circumstances and past
answers.3: partly mine, partly a product of my situation
answers.1: mostly reactions to what life throws at me

questions.text: When I fail to follow through on something, it's because ...
questions.principle: No excuses for lack of execution

answers.4: I messed up, I will try a little harder next time
answers.5: I did not keep my word
answers.3: life happened, I should have pushed harder
answers.1: why would I follow through on that?

questions.text: My life outcomes are mostly the result of ...

answers.4: my choices, though some breaks went against me
answers.2: circumstances I was born into or dealt
answers.3: some luck, some choices — hard to separate
answers.1: fate, luck, or things outside my control

questions.text: When circumstances beyond my control hit, I ...

answers.4: focus on my response, though it's hard sometimes
answers.5: focus on what I can control — my response
answers.2: do what I can, but there's only so much I can control
answers.3: feel stuck, but know I have some choice in how I respond
answers.1: am a victim of what happened

questions.text: When I procrastinate or avoid something, it's ...

answers.4: my choice, though some things are harder to face
answers.2: because I'm overwhelmed or don't have what I need
answers.3: partly the task, partly how I'm dealing with life right now
